title: Full-Time Meta/Google Ads Specialist
job_overview:
Are You a Paid Ads Specialist Who Delivers Results?
Do you have a proven track record of managing and scaling ad campaigns? If yes, we’d love to work with you!

Get $3 for Completing the Test Project and Passing the Interview!
We're offering $3 as a token of appreciation to candidates who complete the test project and successfully pass all stages of the interview process.

Work Schedule:
9:00 AM – 5:00 PM CST (US Time)
Night shift in the Philippines
Fully remote / Work from home

What We’re Looking For:
1–2+ years of hands-on experience managing paid ad campaigns
Experience handling at least $5,000 in monthly ad spend
Ability to build funnels and scale campaigns effectively
Strong cost control skills – knowing when to pause, optimize, or stop campaigns
Proactive with competitor research and staying up-to-date on trends
Portfolio or case studies showing campaign success (preferred)
Meta Certification or other relevant credentials (a plus)
